sentences.sContent: The first and foremost thing is to let people fall in love with the city at first sight, attracting them by its unique image.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first and foremost thing is to let people fall in love with the city at first sight, attracting them by its unique image.
sentences.sCn: 首先要着手做的第一件事，也是最重要的事情就是让人们对这个城市一见钟情，以城市自己独特的形象吸引他们。

sentences.sContent: I have been enjoying my new role with the Mariners but Chongqing put together an appealing proposal that first and foremost gave me the opportunity to coach again.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have been enjoying my new role with the Mariners but Chongqing put together an appealing proposal that first and foremost gave me the opportunity to coach again.
sentences.sCn: 我也非常喜欢我在中央海岸水手俱乐部的新角色，但是重庆让我盛情难却，但是第一位和最重要的是给了我重执教鞭的机会。

remMethod.val: fore(前)+most(最)→放在最前面的→最重要的
